comments.body: When switchport mode is access, it does not appear in running config for an eos device. I think the behavior is similar in NXOS as well. This has to be handled in order to maintain the idempotent state.
Thanks for the update, I have documented the behavior under eos module documentation as well, for NXOS it's already updated.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +210,214 @@
    want_mode = want.get("mode")
    if want_mode and want_mode != have.get("mode"):
        commands.append("switchport mode {0}".format(want_mode))
